content: another pull the contrasting yarn through the three loops now placed on the hook * see the picture on the next page repeat *-* until there are 30 chain stitches or desired length on the seam crochet a row of single stitches around the cuff weave in the ends copyright notice this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern is being freely distributed in ravelry and must not be redistributed without a permission from the author
